name: mocha-wrap
description: Fluent pluggable interface for easily wrapping `describe` and `it` blocks in Mocha tests.
author: Jordan Harband <ljharb@gmail.com>

scripts.tests-only: npm run --silent tape | faucet && npm run --silent mocha1 && npm run --silent mocha2
scripts.mocha1.1: npm run --silent install:mocha1.1 && npm run --silent mocha -- --ignore-leaks
scripts.mocha1.x: npm run --silent install:mocha1.x && npm run --silent mocha -- --ignore-leaks
scripts.mocha2.0: npm run --silent install:mocha2.0 && npm run --silent mocha
scripts.mocha2.x: npm run --silent install:mocha2.x && npm run --silent mocha
scripts.mocha1: npm run --silent mocha1.1 && npm run --silent mocha1.x
scripts.mocha2: npm run --silent mocha2.0 && npm run --silent mocha2.x
